0.0.2.name: wordpress/wp-super-bar
0.0.2.description:
A very simple bar for outgoing links in your posts.

Features:

  • Feature a "DiggBar like" or "Facebook like" to all external links in your posts
  • Whitelist for links that you do not want to apply the WP Super Bar
  • Share your links easly with facebook, digg, twitter, etc...
  • You can easly edit WP Super Bar CSS from your WordPress Backend
  • You can customise text and logo.
